title: Educational Intervention Research Strategies: Strengthening Practical Competencies Through Design Experiments and Mutual Accommodation

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in social fields and grasp of basic research methodologies
context.additional_context: Learning the process of designing and improving educational intervention strategies by field practitioners in a smartphone-based microlearning environment

learning_goals: Learners can iteratively improve innovative learning designs across diverse educational environments through educational intervention design experiments.
Learners can collaboratively develop practical educational intervention plans tailored to real-world contexts by utilizing mutual accommodation strategies.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of educational interventions and derive improvement directions by analyzing data collected in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
